summary: An anime OVA based on the Street Fighter IV Video game.
cast: Hiroki Takahashi|Yûji Kishi|Fumiko Orikasa|Hiroki Yasumoto|Miyuki Sawashiro|Misato Fukuen|Mie Sonozaki|Akio Ôtsuka|Taketora|Jun'ichi Suwabe|Tamio Ôki|Kenji Takahashi|Takayuki Masuda|Yûdai Satô|Ryûsaku Chijiwa|Yurino Yasushi|Tesshô Genda|Rokurô Naya|Kyle Hebert|Reuben Langdon|Laura Bailey|Travis Willingham|Caitlin Glass|Brittney Lee Harvey|Michelle Ruff|Michael McConnohie|Dave Mallow|Doug Erholtz
title: Street Fighter IV - Los lazos que unen
